title: Construction of honey bee hive-like CuO/PbO heterojunction photocatalysts with enhanced antibiotic and dye degradation activity under visible light
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00270A, Paper
Karina Bano, Prit Pal Singh, Sandeep Kumar, Shakir Mahmood Saeed, Saurabh Aggarwal, Ranvijay Kumar, Sandeep Kaushal
Effective removal of harmful water pollutants was achieved with the help of a hydrothermally synthesized visible light-activated CuO/PbO heterojunction material.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
